folder: Portland Avenue N. & Park Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Portland Avenue N. - Park Avenue
text:
North Portland Avenue, west side, between Park and Flushing Avenues, looking north from near the former and showing a W. P. A. sewer project. The houses bear No's. 44 to 32.

July, 1935

Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project

folder: Portland Avenue N. & Park Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Portland Avenue N. - Park Avenue
text:
North Portland Avenue, north from Myrtle Avenue. Note the two W.P.A. office shanties.

View 1: October 12, 1940
Views 2, 3: September 6, 1939

P. L. Sperr

View 2 is north from a point just above Myrtle Avenue, running across Auburn Place and showing the New Cumberland Hospital on the left.

View 3 is north from Auburn Place, it (and view 1) showing only to east side of the street.

Note: All the buildings (except the hospital) were later demolished to make way for the proposed Fort Greene Houses.
